original_title: สาย สีมา นักสู้สามัญชน
overview: Adapted from well-known Thai novel, Ghosts (1957) by Seni Saowaphong. A story of young lawyer from farmer’s family fights for class struggle. From rich and high society to poor and low caste, he fights in the circle for new changes in Thai society.
title: Sai Sema, Commoner Fighter
